content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the power dissipated by resistor <math alttext="R sub 2" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mtext>R</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> </math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator E squared, and denominator 9 R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator E squared, and denominator 6 R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 E, and denominator 3" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>Ɛ</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator E squared, and denominator 9 R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
